title: How to Find Password/ Bypass Password in a Switch Statement using IDA
content:
I'm new to reverse engineering, wondering how access or bypass the password contained in the switch statement ?

File Link

comments.text: You should really give more details. How is the password provided? The shown method has two parameters but none of them is ever used. When asking a question it is better to include all relevant data instead of just linking to an external file.
Please post code as text instead of an image. Makes it easier for others to read/copy and for sites like google to index.
Also it depends on a lot of factors here. Just by looking at this switch I can say its sort of a VM that has been implemented and we might need the whole binary to analyze this.
@Robert they are used in case 5 and they are argc and argv[1] it takes an argument from command line
@blabb Correct. I did not notice because the code was added as screenshot so it could not be searched for text (-> Leon please do not add code as screenshot. Always copy the text!)
